name: obsidian-to-redbook
description: 一键将 Obsidian 中的 Markdown 笔记转换为小红书封面图片

scripts.build: npm run build:main && npm run build:vue && cp manifest.json LICENSE dist/ && cp -r dist/vue/* dist/ && rm -rf dist/vue
scripts.version: node version-bump.mjs && git add manifest.json versions.json
scripts.package: mkdir -p release && cp dist/main.js dist/styles.css manifest.json release/ && zip -r release/obsidian-vue-plugin-template.zip release/*
